title: Mid and Jungler looking for a ranked 5s team :3
body:
Me and my mate are looking for a ranked 5s team.
I am a mid main and he is a jungler main, but occasionally we play bot duo, so if need be we can bot lane but preferably we would like to stay with our main roles. Preferably Silver+ teams.
Just add either me (Kookii) or Hewley in game for more info. 
 ^_^

replies.body: if u guys get a team together let me know, i main mid/adc/jung in that order but fill most games in soloq, add me in-game, "DemonzMercy" im s4 atm but was g4 last season. keen for an active team
